DOC.brief_summary: Purpose: To investigate diagnostic performance of CT and MR in intraductal papillary mucinous neoplasm with malignant change according to international consensus guidelines 2012. Hypothesis: According to 2012 consensus guidelines, enhanced solid component and main pancreatic duct size of larger than 10 mm will be significant.
DOC.brief_title: Intraductal Papillary Mucinous Neoplasm With Malignant Change
DOC.detailed_description: 1. Purpose - To investigate diagnostic performance of CT and MR in intraductal papillary mucinous neoplasm with malignant change according to international consensus guidelines 2012 2. Enroll criteria - Patient who is suspected to have pancreas IPMN on imaging - Interval between imaging study and surgery is less than 2 months - Who is scheduled for surgery due to IPMN
DOC.criteria: Patients who is suspected to have IPMN by imaging study or clinician Time interval between imaging study and surgery less than 2 months Patients who have pathology results not by surgery Who is less than 20 years old Who cannot voluntarily agree study design
